name: Network File Sharing & Mapping
description: Learn to map network drives and share files across the automation network
author: Broetje Automation Training Team

tasks.name: Share a Folder on Local PC
tasks.description: Create a shared folder on your local PC that can be accessed from other machines on the network
instructions: Navigate to the drive you want to share (usually C: or D:)
Right-click on the folder you want to share
Select Properties from the context menu
Keep the default Share name or change it
Select Everyone and ensure Full Control is checked

tasks.name: Create Site Standard Temp Folder
tasks.description: Create a personal temp directory following Broetje naming standards
instructions: Inside Temp, create a folder with your initials (e.g., D:\Temp\MG)

tasks.name: Map a Network Drive
tasks.description: Map a shared folder from another computer as a network drive
instructions: Click 'This PC' in the left sidebar
Click the 'Map network drive' button in the ribbon
Choose an available drive letter (e.g., Z:)

tasks.name: Test File Transfer
tasks.description: Transfer a test file between PCs using the mapped drive
instructions: Type a test message and save
Verify the file appears on the original computer
Open and edit the file from both computers
